data.name: PosSocketsService.UnSupportedStoreIPAddress
data.value: The NGC port {0}:{1} does not support connection on remote port {2}:{3}

data.name: PosSocketsService.SocketException
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} is not usable

data.name: PosSocketsService.PosSet.DuplicateTransaction
data.value: Could not apply points as the transaction is a duplicate. The transaction store is '{4}', date is '{5}', POS Number is '{6}' and Transaction Number is '{7}'. The request was sent via the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}. The data sent is:{8}

data.name: PosSocketsService.PosSet.InvalidCardNumber
data.value: Could not apply points as the card account number {4} is invalid. The request was sent via the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}. The data sent is:{5}

data.name: PosSocketsService.PosSet.FutureTransaction
data.value: Could not apply points as the transaction is too far in the future. The transaction store is '{4}', date is '{5}', POS Number is '{6}' and Transaction Number is '{7}'. The request was sent via the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}. The data sent is:{8}

data.name: PosSocketsService.PosSet.PointsExceeded
data.value: Could not apply {5} points to Card Account {4} as the maximum points limit would be exceeded. The request was sent via the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}. The data sent is:{6}

data.name: PosSocketsService.PosVoucherRedeem.UnknownTransaction
data.value: Could not apply vouchers as the transaction is unknown. The transaction store is '{4}', date is '{5}', POS Number is '{6}' and Transaction Number is '{7}'. The request was sent via the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}. The data sent is:{8}

data.name: PosSocketsService.TimeoutDataReceived
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} has timed out waiting to receive data for longer than {4} milliseconds.

data.name: PosSocketsService.TimeoutDataSent
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} has timed out waiting to send data for longer than {4} milliseconds. The data sent is:{5}

data.name: PosSocketsService.IncompleteDataSent
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} has sent incompleted data. NGC Server only sent {5} bytes out of {4}. The data sent is:\n{6}

data.name: PosSocketsService.DataFormatError
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} has received {4} in the wrong data. The data sent is:{5}

data.name: PosSocketsService.DataValueError
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} has received {4} with the incorrect value {5}. The data sent is:{6}

data.name: PosSocketsService.DatabaseError
data.value: The connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3} has sent data incompatible with the database causing the stored procedure {4} to return the result code {5}. The data sent is:{6}

data.name: PosSocketsService.UnexpectedException
data.value: Unexpected error occurred while handling the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}.

data.name: PosSocketsService.UnknownMessageType
data.value: The server could not identify the message type(s) to support on the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}.

data.name: PosSocketsService.DatabaseUnavailable
data.value: Could not process request as the Database is not available. The request was sent via the connection between NGC port {0}:{1} and Store port {2}:{3}. The data sent is:{4}
